mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SIDE_MENU_CODE , BOARD_SIDE_MENU_NAME , BOARD_SIDE_MENU_URL FROM BOARD_SIDE_MENU

SELECT HBT_BOARD_NUM , HBT_BOARD_TITLE , HBT_BOARD_CONTENT , HBT_BOARD_CNT , REPLY_CNT , TO_CHAR(HBT_BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HBT_BOARD_REG_DATE , MEM_CODE , (SELECT MEM_ID FROM HBT_MEM WHERE MEM_CODE = HBT_BOARD.MEM_CODE) MEM_ID , IS_PRIVATE , PRIVATE_PW FROM HBT_BOARD
WHERE IS_NOTICE = #{isNotice}
AND UPPER(${groundSearchVO.searchKey}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{groundSearchVO.searchVal})||'%'
ORDER BY HBT_BOARD_NUM DESC OFFSET #{groundSearchVO.offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{groundSearchVO.displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(HBT_BOARD_NUM) FROM HBT_BOARD
WHERE UPPER(${searchKey}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchVal})||'%'

SELECT HBT_BOARD_NUM , HBT_BOARD_TITLE , HBT_BOARD_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(HBT_BOARD_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HBT_BOARD_REG_DATE , MEM_CODE , (SELECT MEM_ID FROM HBT_MEM WHERE MEM_CODE = HBT_BOARD.MEM_CODE) MEM_ID , REPLY_CNT , HBT_BOARD_CNT FROM HBT_BOARD WHERE HBT_BOARD_NUM = #{hbtBoardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE HBT_BOARD SET HBT_BOARD_CNT = HBT_BOARD_CNT +1 WHERE HBT_BOARD_NUM = #{hbtBoardCnt}
mapper.select: SELECT HBT_BOARD_REPLY_NUM , HBT_BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT , HBT_BOARD_REPLY.MEM_CODE , TO_CHAR(HBT_BOARD_REPLY_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HBT_BOARD_REPLY_REG_DATE , (SELECT MEM_ID FROM HBT_MEM WHERE MEM_CODE = HBT_BOARD_REPLY.MEM_CODE) MEM_ID , HBT_BOARD_NUM , MEM_ROLE , HBT_BOARD_REPLY_NUM_FK , REPLY_DEPTH FROM HBT_BOARD_REPLY, HBT_MEM WHERE HBT_BOARD_NUM = #{hbtBoardNum} AND HBT_BOARD_REPLY.MEM_CODE = HBT_MEM.MEM_CODE ORDER BY HBT_BOARD_REPLY_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE HBT_BOARD SET REPLY_CNT = REPLY_CNT +1 WHERE HBT_BOARD_NUM = #{hbtBoardNum}
UPDATE HBT_BOARD SET REPLY_CNT = REPLY_CNT - 1 WHERE HBT_BOARD_NUM = #{hbtBoardNum}
UPDATE HBT_BOARD_REPLY SET HBT_BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT = #{hbtBoardReplyContent} WHERE HBT_BOARD_REPLY_NUM = #{hbtBoardReplyNum}
